u.a: <1w-2w> holds object out to Amy <1w> picks up object .
picks up object and puts back in dollhouse
<1w> picks up object from dollhouse and holds out to Amy
picks up object from dollhouse and holds out to Amy
wiggles in hand . holds objects in both hands
<1w> picks up table , examines and puts in dollhouse <1w> puts object in dollhouse . picks up chair and puts in dollhouse .
<1w-4w> picks up table , examines and puts in dollhouse
<dur> picks up another chair and puts by table . picks up man and puts in chair <bef> picks up chair and puts down by table .
puts toys on floor and leans on dollhouse with hands on rim
<aft> looks at Mother's object , at car and at dollhouse as Mother uses each
<aft> puts object on dollhouse floor . picks up car and puts outside dollhouse . pushes dollhouse back
<1w> puts down on side of dollhouse
puts object down . takes two men out of dollhouse and holds
takes chair from dollhouse and puts on floor . takes another chair out and begins to put on floor but stops . moves toward Amy and puts chair on floor in front of her
picks up chair out of dollhouse , drops , picks up again . begins to put on floor but stops , examines , and puts down by Mother's chair
<aft> picks up chair with other hand and holds both to knee <dur> lowers one man toward chair . <bef> manipulates men , holding one in each hand .
walks another man out dollhouse door and puts in chair
<dur> picks up man and puts in car . pushes car toward Amy slightly <1w> moves chair toward Amy slightly .
<dur> picks up man and puts in car . pushes car toward Amy slightly
picks up chicken by Amy and puts in car
attempts to put man in car
succeeds in getting man in car
examines man in hand . attempts to put man in car . knocks other man out . succeeds
picks up man , puts back in car and drives car in front of Amy
picks up chair and puts on floor . puts man in chair , tilting
pushes toys on floor , knocks ladder and puts hands on toys on floor
<1w> picks up dog and makes him climb the ladder
pushes toys toward ladder and ladder falls
rights ladder , makes dog climb it and dance on the rim
<aft> takes table out of dollhouse and puts down by chair
picks up Mother's man and holds with other object
picks up chair by Amy and puts down by table
<aft> reaches in dollhouse , takes out object and puts on floor
<aft> picks up man and holds . dog falls . examines objects . lets another object fall
takes man from open hand and attempts to put in car
picks up dog and brings to table
takes hand back and holds man and objects
<1w-5w> picks up boy , walks him toward table and puts him in chair
<1w-4w> picks up boy , walks him toward table and puts him in chair
walks man toward chair and puts in chair
<1w> examines object in hand <1w> attempts to put man in chair and succeeds .
takes block out of shape box , drops , and retrieves
takes ball out of shape box and holds
holds object out on her palm toward Amy . closes palm
ball drops . picks up ball and holds . kicks object on floor away
fingers ball on top . takes hand away
pushes dollhouse away and shuts door . puts balls on top
<aft> retrieves ball and puts on shape box lid
opens shape box lid and block falls . holds open a bit and then shuts
picks up ball and attempts to put in wrong hole . bangs on lid with block . puts block in right hole
opens shape box and block falls
shuts shape box lid . puts own ball in . opens shape box lid
<dur> puts hand in shape box and back out <bef> puts block in shape box .
reaches in shape box and takes out block . shuts lid , rubs block on lid and puts in shape box
opens shape box lid , takes out same block , shuts lid and puts in shape box
opens shape box and reaches in
takes Mother's hand out . reaches in shape box and rummages
<aft> puts finger to shape box lid
<aft> rummages in shape box <dur> puts hand on shape box lid and opens it . holds it open . <bef> takes block out of shape box , shuts lid and puts in shape box .
puts hand in shape box and rummages . takes out blocks
attempts to remove Mother's hand . takes block out and holds
<aft> puts block in shape box but it sticks
attempts to put square block in circular hole
<aft> puts block in shape box . takes out round block and attempts to put in wrong hole
picks up square block and holds out to Amy
lifts block up and takes Mother's block . puts round block in shape box but it sticks . attempts to push through with index finger
<bef> opens shape box a bit and block falls through and lid falls shut
<dur> opens shape box lid <bef> lifts shape box lid a bit and lets it shut . repeats two times .
takes block from shape box and holds under arm with other blocks . reaches in and out of shape box
<aft> dumps box out , rights box and shuts lid
helps with shape box . puts hand over box and block falls from under her arm
opens shape box and reaches in
takes block from shape box and puts on floor
picks up block and holds out to Amy
takes block and puts under other arm

<aft> touches shape box lid with block and puts block through hole . touches blocks in arm . puts slab block in other hand . holds square block toward wrong hole while holding slab toward floor . attempts to put square block in
<dur> fingers and holds it <bef> picks up another slab .
<dur> holds block over hole <bef> taps block on lid .
takes block and tries fourth hole
manipulates blocks . takes slab again and puts by hole
